meanings.sent1: His constant jackassery in class disrupted everyone's learning.
meanings.sent2: Stop the jackassery and start taking your responsibilities seriously.
meanings.sent3: The teacher couldn't help but chuckle at the student's jackassery during the presentation.
meanings.sent4: His reckless driving was a prime example of jackassery on the roads.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of his jackassery finally caught up with him.

meanings.sent1: Her loud music at night was pure jackassery.
meanings.sent2: I can't stand his constant jackassery at the office.
meanings.sent3: The neighbor's jackassery with their barking dog kept everyone awake.
meanings.sent4: The politician's empty promises were just political jackassery.
meanings.sent5: The team's constant bickering was a display of workplace jackassery.
